author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Nasdaq April 2018 U.S. Equity Options Volume Of 138 Mln Of Contracts Vs 113 Mln Of Contracts In April 2017
text:
May 2 (Reuters) - Nasdaq Inc:
* NASDAQ INC - APRIL 2018 U.S. EQUITY OPTIONS VOLUME OF 138 MILLION OF CONTRACTS VERSUS 113 MILLION OF CONTRACTS IN APRIL 2017
* NASDAQ INC - APRIL 2018 EUROPEAN OPTIONS AND FUTURES VOLUME 7.7 MILLION OF CONTRACTS VERSUS 5.9 MILLION OF CONTRACTS IN APRIL 2017
* NASDAQ INC - APRIL 2018 U.S. MATCHED EQUITY VOLUME 26,619 MLNS OF SHARES VERSUS 23,015 MLNS OF SHARES IN APRIL 2017
* NASDAQ INC - FOR APRIL 2018 US FIXED INCOME VOLUME $1,242 BILLION TRADED VERSUS $1,481 BILLION TRADED IN APRIL 2017
* NASDAQ INC - FOR APRIL 2018 EUROPEAN FIXED INCOME 1.9 MLNS OF CONTRACTS VERSUS 2 MLNS OF CONTRACTS IN APRIL 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
